titleInfo.title: The Record of the Transmission of the Lamp Published in the Jǐngdé Era

mods.note: This text in 30 fascicles was edited in 1004 and submitted to Emperor Zhēnzōng 真宗 (r. 993-1022). Subsequently it was recognized as the first 'official' historical work of the Chán School. In 1011 the text was incorporated in the Chinese Buddhist canon (Tripitaka), sanctioned by the Emperor.
